thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Asian Stocks Rise, Fueled by Wall Street

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Asian Stocks Rise, Fueled by Wall Street
text:
S&P 500 rises Netflix surges after earnings Bank of Japan cools speculation of higher rates this year The S&P 500 was on track for a fresh record Tuesday following the latest raft of corporate earnings.
Investors say a rosy economic and policy backdrop has stocks poised to continue marching higher, though some are concerned about the pace of the rally and elevated earnings expectations. Another record close for the S&P 500 would be its 12th this monthâ€”the most ever in January, according to WSJ Market Data Group....
